DOC.brief_summary: The HEPAFIT Study aims to examine whether a 6-months physical education program has benefits on hepatic metabolism and cardiovascular health as well as on selected physical fitness and mental health outcomes among adolescent overweight/obese from Bogota, Colombia.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training and Hepatic Metabolism in Overweight/Obese Adolescent
DOC.criteria: Overweight or obesity status 1117 years old Written informed consent Interested in improving health and fitness Any other conditions which, in opinion of the investigators, would adversely affect the conduct of the trial. Clinical diagnosis of diabetes Pregnancy Drugs/alcohol abuse
